abilities.name: Starlit Hourglass
abilities.description: Starlit HourglassAbilityBUFF Each time Cyclops hits an enemy with his skills, all his skill cooldowns are reduced by 0.5s.

abilities.name: Stardust Shock
abilities.description: Stardust ShockAbilityAoETypeMagic Skill Cyclops casts two Stardust Disks in the target direction, each dealing 275(+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in its path. 8.550

abilities.name: Planets Attack
abilities.description: Planets AttackAbilityBurstTypeMagic Skill Cyclops conjures Starlit Spheres around himself while gaining 50% Movement Speed that decays over 2s. The spheres will automatically seek and attack nearby enemies (prioritizes enemy heroes), exploding on collision and dealing 200(+40% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the enemy. Enemies hit by multiple spheres will take reduced damage after the first hit. 14.060

abilities.name: Star Power Lockdown
abilities.description: Star Power LockdownAbilityCC DamageTypeMagic Skill Cyclops creates a Planetary Sphere and sends it after the target enemy hero or Creep, dealing 500(+120% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and immobilizing them for 0.75-1.5s (increases with travel distance). 26.060
